Title: Episode 8
Plot: Cardwell and Grace grow closer, and the developer reveals his plans to move back to the bay permanently. Meredith tries to go too far too quickly, and is almost swallowed up in her vision.
GuestStars: Jason Te Mete as Rufus' Teacher, Jony Eichler as Boy #1, James Heath as Boy #2, Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata
